com.samsung.android.sdk.composer.document

Class SpenContentBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.composer.document.SpenContentBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SpenContentDrawing, SpenContentHandWriting, SpenContentImage, SpenContentText, SpenContentVoice, SpenContentWeb

    public class SpenContentBase
extends Object
    Base class of all primitive contents.
    ContentBase can not be used by itself.
    Since:
    5.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void appendSpan(SpenTextSpan span)
      Add the specified span information.
      Where there are existing spans, this method merges the new span with the existing spans.
      void clearChangedFlag()
      Clear the set changed flag.
      The changed flag is set when content data is changed using the API.
      If this content is saved by SpenSDoc, clear the flag.
      void copy(SpenContentBase source)
      Copy data from the specified content.
      boolean equals(Object o)
      Check if the specified content is the same as the current content.

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        public int getType()
        Get the content type.
        Returns:
        One of TYPE_TEXT, TYPE_IMAGE, TYPE_HANDWRITING, TYPE_DRAWING and TYPE_VOICE.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • setThumbnailPath

        public void setThumbnailPath(String path)
        Set the thumbnail image from the specified file.
        Parameters:
        path - The image file path.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if path is invalid and this content is contained by specified SpenSDoc.
        Since:
        5.0.0 * @see #getThumbnailPath

      • copy

        public void copy(SpenContentBase source)

        Parameters:
        source - The source content.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if class type is different. Or if source is null.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • setSpan

        public void setSpan(ArrayList<SpenTextSpan> spanList)
        Set the specified span information. If the new span and the existing span share a type and their regions overlap, the span overlap region is merged internally.
        So the span value that is set and the span value that is got may not both always match.
        Parameters:
        spanList - The span information.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • getSpan

        public ArrayList<SpenTextSpan> getSpan()
        Get the span information.
        Returns:
        The span information.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • findSpan

        public ArrayList<SpenTextSpan> findSpan(int startIndex,
                                        int endIndex)
        Find the list of spans between the specified start position and end position.
        Parameters:
        startIndex - The index of the first character for finding span information.
        endIndex - The index of the last character for finding span information.
        Returns:
        The list of span information.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • removeSpan

        public void removeSpan(SpenTextSpan span)
        Remove the specified spans.
        Parameters:
        span - The span instance.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • appendSpan

        public void appendSpan(SpenTextSpan span)
        Add the specified span information.
        Where there are existing spans, this method merges the new span with the existing spans.
        Parameters:
        span - The span instance.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • isChanged

        public boolean isChanged()
        Check if the content is changed.
        The changed flag is set when content data is changed using the API.
        If this content is saved by SpenSDoc, clear the flag.
        Returns:
        true if content data is changed or created. Otherwise false.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • clearChangedFlag

        public void clearChangedFlag()
        Clear the set changed flag.
        The changed flag is set when content data is changed using the API.
        If this content is saved by SpenSDoc, clear the flag.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • getLength

        public int getLength()
        Get the length of content.
        Returns:
        The length.
        Since:
        5.0.0
